item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: Input data library(opendatatoronto) library(dplyr) # get package package <- show_package("fc4d95a6-591f-411f-af17-327e6c5d03c7") # get all resources for this package resources <- list_package_resources("fc4d95a6-591f-411f-af17-327e6c5d03c7") # identify datastore resources; by default, Toronto Open Data sets datastore resource format to CSV for non-geospatial and GeoJSON for geospatial resources datastore_resources <- filter(resources, tolower(format) %in% c('csv', 'geojson')) # load the first datastore resource as a sample data <- filter(datastore_resources, row_number()==1) %>% get_resource() data summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min.
